food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to peel me before they eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of the sun

food.question: I am round and juicy, and often red or green. You can take a big bite of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 A worm sometimes lives inside me!

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?
I am white and cold. You can eat me with a spoon. I am often sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt when it is hot
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. Sometimes kids don't want to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 You might see me in soup.

food.question: I am long and thin and brown. You can dip me in ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am often served with burgers.
🧂 You can sprinkle salt on me

food.question: I am round and orange. You can make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am the color of the sunset.
🧃 You can drink me at breakfast.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 A large farm animal gives me to you.
🥛 You can pour me in a glass.

food.question: I am small, round and sweet, and often red, green, or purple. I grow in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 You can make juice or jam from me.
🧺 I grow in a large group.

food.question: I am made of dough and have a hole in the middle. You can put sprinkles on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I have a big hole in the middle.
🎂 You can buy me at a bakery.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I walk sideways on the sand, and have pinchers. What am I?
I am a fish that's orange and white and very small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in a sea anemone.
🎬 You may have seen me in a movie.

ocean.question: I am hard and you can find me on the beach. Sometimes, you can hear the ocean in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be a home for a sea creature.

ocean.question: I am very big and grey, and I swim in the ocean and sing. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I spout water from my head.
🐳 I am a very large mammal.

ocean.question: I'm a star, but I live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am not in the sky.
🌊 I am found on the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I'm a big, slippery animal with sharp teeth and a fin on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?
I'm a very slow animal with a shell and I swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live a long time.

ocean.question: I look like a horse but I live in the sea. What am I?
